subject: Football
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. will not enforce the four-game suspensions of the New Orleans Saints’ defensive ends Charles Grant and Will Smith at this time, opening the way for them to play this week and possibly the entire 2009 season. Commissioner Roger Goodell said it would be unfair to suspend them now, considering the league had been blocked from suspending Vikings linemen Pat Williams and Kevin Williams for the same offense while their case was pending in Minnesota state court.
